name: avo
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an avocado (= a tropical fruit with a large round seed and thick skin) or its green flesh: This dish is a great way to use avos that are a bit past their best. The salad is just assorted leaves with avo, boiled egg, and olives.
Tobias Titz/GettyImages
More examplesFewer examplesI don't think that there's much you can say about the avo and prawns.Place the fish on a bed of asparagus, leaves, avo and tomato. As I had no meat I used baby spinach leaves and avo.
